post.description:
Sends a shipment consisting of one consignment, that must include at least one package, from one sender to one receiver.

The ShipmentType must be Instruction and must include a Shipment Header.

A Senders reference must be included and must have a value.

The LM Service Codes, in the Shipping Guide, must consist of valid Unit Codes.

A valid combination of an additional party, with party type TransportCompany and a valid Transport company code as the partyId value and an optional subPartyId and service, is required. In addition there might be several value added services that can be added. Please refer to valid product codes/services and VASes.

If an included product requires an additional service, that additional service must be included.

Value Added Service Codes may only feature once in any Shipment.

The following Additional Services must be accompanied by the following additions

  • 1000 - must include a Cash on Delivery entry
  • 1036 - must include a SubClass of DeliveryParty entry
  • 1134 - Receiver.ContactName must have a value
  • 1142 - Receiver.ContactName and Receiver.MobilePhone must both have a value
  • 1150 - Receiver.Email must have a value
  • 1245 - must include a DangerousGoods entry

Conversely

  • When Cash on Delivery is specified, it must be a valid CashOnDelivery and an AdditionalService with value 1000 must be included
  • When a Goods Item is specified, it must be valid GoodsItem
  • When a DangerousGoods is specified, AdditionalService must be 1245
  • The ProductAndService specified must have a valid TariffReference
  • The Sender specified must be a valid GeneralParty
  • The Receiver specified, must be a valid GeneralParty
  • When an AdditionalParty is specified, it must be a valid AdditionalParty and must include a subClass of TransportCompany

If requested through the query parameters, the service will create a shipment ID (for the whole shipment) in addition to package IDs for each package. The package IDs will be returned in the order of the packages (i.e. package 1 in the input will have package ID 1 in returned ar

The structure and most of the content will be validated.

parameters.name: createShipmentId
parameters.description: If "true" the API will assign a shipment ID for you and return it in the response.

parameters.name: createPackageId
parameters.description: If "true" the API will assign all package IDs for you and return them in the response.

expressCourier.description: Book a Bring Express Courier shipment
Book a Bring Express Courier shipment

200.description: Successful delivery and package/shipment IDs if requested

400.description: Error in validation of request or error in data structure of request

500.description: Unknown error. Error sending data to destination.

post.description:
Sends a booking request consisting of a Shipment with a Goods Item attached. The Goods Item must contain a Package.

A consignment value must not be included as this would imply that the shipment itself, was to be created.

parameters.name: createShipmentId
parameters.description: If "true" the API will assign a shipment ID for you and return it in the response.

parameters.name: createPackageId
parameters.description: If "true" the API will assign all package IDs for you and return them in the response.

200.description: Confirmation of successful delivery and package/shipment IDs if requested

400.description: Error in validation of request or error in data structure of request

500.description: Unknown error. Error sending data to destination.

postalCode.description: Postal code. Must be a valid Norwegian postal code.
Senders postal code. Must be a valid Norwegian postal code.

Order.description: An order to place in Mybring.

customerNumber.description: API customer number for which to place the order.

senderEmail.description: Sender's email address. Defaults to the user's email address.

postalCode.description: Sender's postal code. Must be a valid Norwegian postal code.

reference.description: A reference for the shipment that will be shown on the invoice.

testIndicator.description: Set to true when testing API implementation.

returnAddress.description: An optional return address. If set will override the return address in generated label.

packages.description: The packages to send in this shipment.

Package.description: A single package in a shipment.

packageId.description: PackageId, can be inserted by the API.

SuccessfulOrder.title: Successful Order
SuccessfulOrder.description: A successfully placed order that contains links to labels and waybill.

testIndicator.description: Whether the placed order had the testIndicator flag set or not.

id.description: The ID of the order that was placed.

customerNumber.description: The API customer number for which the order was placed.

customerName.description: The name of the customer for which the order was placed.

customerOrganizationNumber.description: The organization number of the customer for which the order was placed.

postalPlace.description: The city/place for the postal code.

email.description: Sender's email address for the order that was placed.

reference.description: A reference for the shipment that will be shown on the invoice.

labelUri.description: URL to PDF label(s) for packages ordered without tracking.

rfidLabelUri.description: URL to ZPL label(s) for packages ordered with tracking.

waybillUri.description: URL to waybill PDF that has to be printed and sent with the shipment.

orderNumberReference.description: The order number reference for the placed order. This is the number on the waybill.

vat.description: How much of the price was VAT (MVA).

orderTime.description: Timestamp for when the order was placed.

returnAddress.description: Return address for the order if one is set

OrderedPackage.title: Ordered Package
OrderedPackage.description: A single package in a successfully ordered shipment.

rfid.description: Whether to [tracking for the package](#tracking-with-rfid) was activated.

postalPlace.description: The city/place for the postal code.

shipmentNumber.description: The shipment number for this package. A package in a PIP shipment will have both a shipment number and a package number.

packageNumber.description: The package number for this package. This goes on the label.

agreementNumber.description: Whether the customer has an agreement price for this package.

postalPlace.description: The city/place for the postal code.

reference.description: A reference for the shipment that will be shown on the invoice.

orderTime.description: Timestamp for when the order was validated.

returnAddress.description: Return address for the order if one is set

packages.description: Packages in this validated shipment. The packages in the response will correspond to same order as it was in the request to make it easier for clients to do any mapping if needed.

priceType.description: Whether the Price is Agreement or List

id.description: The ID of the order that was placed.

customerNumber.description: The API customer number for the validated order.

customerName.description: The API customer name for which the order was placed.

customerOrganizationNumber.description: The organization number of the customer for which the order was placed.

reference.description: A reference for the shipment that will be shown on the invoice.

rfidLabelUri.description: URL to ZPL label(s) for packages ordered with tracking.

returnAddress.description: Return address for the order if one is set

RequestDate.description: Date and time for when the request was created

updateIndicator.description: Is this request an original, update or a deletion

DateAndTimes.description: Date and times for the message, repeatable structure. Several dates are required

AdditionalParty.description: Additionalparties for the shipment, repeatable. Refer to detailed instructions

CashOnDelivery.description: Cash on delivery for the shipment

GoodsItem.description: Information about the goods being shipped

ShipmentHeaders.description: Structure that handles information for the whole shipment

NumberOfPackages.description: Total number of packages for the whole shipment across all goodsitems. Must be equal to the number of GoodsItems in the message.

AdditionalReference.description: Additional references for the shipment as indicated by referenceType

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight for the whole shipment

GrossVolume.description: Gross volume for the whole shipment

Dimensions.description: Dimensions required for the whole shipment

LoadingMetres.description: How many metres of loading space required of a truck's length

PalletFootPrints.description: How many pallet footprints are needed for the shipment

HazardPoints.description: Sum of hazard points for the shipment

ExchangableEquipment.description: Equipment that can be reused, ie. pallets

shipmentId.description: Id for the whole shipment, can be retrieved by the API. ShipmentId must be of length 17 for GS1, 10 for SIS or 11 for UPS.

DateTime.description: Date and Time (for non DocumentDate, date cannot be in the past)

partyId.description: Identifier for the party (compulsory if Receiver partyId and additionalParty of 'FreightPayer' not specified).

Name.description: Party name (compulsory if DangerousGoods are specified)

Reference.description: Reference related to the party, can be used for account number of pallet system in Sweden for instance.

partyId.description: Identifier for the party (compulsory if Sender partyId and additionalParty of 'FreightPayer' not specified).

Reference.description: Reference related to the party, can be used for account number of pallet system in Sweden for instance.

subClass.description: Type of Party (at least one subClass must be 'TansportCompany')

Reference.description: Further references related to the party

ProductAndService.description: Product and service codes in addition to value added service structures

ProductCode.description: Productcode for shipment, refer to documentation for valid productcodes for this service

TariffReference.description: Additional information about the price of the cargo in connection with the service

NatureOfCargo.description: Indicates if the cargo is out of bound of general expected parameters, dangerous goods or out of gauge

ConditionCode.description: The actual terms for the chosen deliverytermstype

Location.description: The location where the given deliveryterms (condition) applies (to or from given conditioncode.)

ControlDigit.description: Control digit for incoming amount when there is specified a KID number (Norwegian only)

MonetaryAccount.description: Description of where the money should be received

PackageTypeCode.description: Types of cargo, packaging of cargo. Either use supported enumeration or UN/ECE Recommendation 21

SealId.description: Item sealed for customs etc, number of the seal

Temperature.description: Temperature requirements for goods being shipped

CustomsDetails.description: List of Customs Details for goods being shipped

PackingDetails.description: List of Package Details for goods being shipped

InsuranceValue.description: The Amount the package is insured for.

Email.description: Email related to the insurance information

Value.description: Amount the package is insureed for

AddressLine.description: Address lines. The first line will be mapped to primary address line

StateOrRegion.description: State or region, not in use in the nordic countries

CountryCode.description: Country code. Use valid country codes

AdditionalServiceCode.description: The additional service code for the product

ServiceRequirements.description: Some AdditionalServiceCodes / valueadded service might require extra information.

City.description: City where the deliveryterms are valid to or from

CountryCode.description: Country where the deliveryterms ar valid to or from

Value.description: The value to identify where the money should be sent

AccountHolderName.description: Name of the owner of the account

Storage.description: Temperature requirements for storage of goods

CountryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin of the package

TradePreference.description: Trade preference data for the package

TariffLineAmount.description: Tariff Line Amount of the package

CustomsArticleNumber.description: Customs Article Number of the package

Flashpoint.description: Flashpointinformation for dangerousgoods (when will the item become volatile?)

PackingGroup.description: Packing danger level code, roman numeral between  1 and 3

Restrictions.description: Restrictions when carrying these hazardous goods

HazardPoints.description: Points for this hazard. Calculated from factor for dangerousgoods multiplied by amount in kg / dm3 for each material in cargo

regulatonCode.description: Regulation codes for the hazardous goods

ArticlePrice.description: Artical Price of the Packing Details

ItemOrdered.description: Item Ordered within the Packing Details

ItemBackOrder.description: Item Back Order within Packing Details

Value.example: Call the contact before delivering item

accountType.description: Type of account to receive payment on delivery

Value.description: Specific temperature for transportation of the cargo

currencyCode.description: Currency code of the tariff line

HazardIdentifier.description: United nations dangerous goods hazard identifier

FlashpointDescription.example: BLACK POWDER, granulated or in powderform

Value.description: Freetext specification of restriction for given tunnel. One element for each UN number in the dangerousgoods sequence
Value.example: Ellingsy- og Valderytunnelen p riksveg 658 utenfor lesund. Her gjelder tunnelkategori C i tidsrommet kl. 06002400 hver dag

validRequestXml.value:
<CreateShipmentRequest xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://api.bring.com/CreateShipment">
  <RequestVersion xmlns="">1</RequestVersion>
  <RequestDate xmlns="">2021-04-20T10:55:07</RequestDate>
  <Shipment updateIndicator="Original" shipmentType="Instruction" xmlns="">
    <ShipmentHeaders shipmentId="70722150702977990">
      <SendersReference>1878959</SendersReference>
      <NumberOfPackages>1</NumberOfPackages>
      <GrossWeight unitCode="KGM">1</GrossWeight>
      <LoadingMetres>0</LoadingMetres>
      <PalletFootPrints>0</PalletFootPrints>
      <HazardPoints>0</HazardPoints>
    </ShipmentHeaders>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DocumentDate">
      <DateTime>2022-04-20T10:55:07</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DeliveryEarliest">
      <DateTime>2022-04-20T16:00:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DeliveryLatest">
      <DateTime>2022-04-20T21:00:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="PickupEarliest">
      <DateTime>2022-04-20T14:00:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="PickupLatest">
      <DateTime>2022-04-20T18:00:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <Sender partyId="28371">
      <Name>Sender Company</Name>
      <Address>
        <AddressLine>Street Name 52</AddressLine>
        <PostalCode>5147</PostalCode>
        <City>FYLLINGSDALEN</City>
        <CountryCode>NO</CountryCode>
      </Address>
      <Phone>+4712345678</Phone>
    </Sender>
    <Receiver>
      <Name>Trine Firstname Lastname</Name>
      <Address>
        <AddressLine>Street Name 107</AddressLine>
        <PostalCode>5143</PostalCode>
        <City>FYLLINGSDALEN</City>
        <CountryCode>NO</CountryCode>
      </Address>
      <MobilePhone>91234567</MobilePhone>
    </Receiver>
    <AdditionalParty subClass="GoodsReturnParty">
      <Name>Ola Nordmann</Name>
      <Address>
        <PostalCode>1065</PostalCode>
        <City>OSLO</City>
        <CountryCode>NO</CountryCode>
        <AddressLine>Storgatan 1</AddressLine>
      </Address>
      <MobilePhone>4712345678</MobilePhone>
      <Email>ola.nordmann@someemail.com</Email>
      <ContactName>Ola Nordmann</ContactName>
    </AdditionalParty>
    <AdditionalParty subClass="TransportCompany" partyId="BEX" subPartyId="GLW" />
    <ProductAndService>
      <ProductCode>3270</ProductCode>
    </ProductAndService>
    <GoodsItem>
      <PackageTypeCode>PK</PackageTypeCode>
      <GoodsDescription>Boxes of pepper mills</GoodsDescription>
      <Package packageId="370722150758796447">
        <GrossWeight unitCode="KGM">1</GrossWeight>
      </Package>
    </GoodsItem>
  </Shipment>
</CreateShipmentRequest>

validRequestBookingXml.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<CreateBookingRequest xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://api.bring.com/CreateShipment">
  <RequestVersion xmlns="">1</RequestVersion>
  <RequestDate xmlns="">2019-01-31T07:33:09.9666092+01:00</RequestDate>
  <Shipment updateIndicator="Original" shipmentType="Booking" xmlns="">
    <ShipmentHeaders shipmentId="73500012345678911">
      <SendersReference>CUSTOMERS REFERENCE</SendersReference>
      <NumberOfPackages>2</NumberOfPackages>
      <AdditionalReference referenceType="BOOKING_REFERENCE">
        <ReferenceValue>Dummy</ReferenceValue>
      </AdditionalReference>
      <FreeText usageCode="PICKUP_INSTRUCTIONS">
        <Text>My instructions for pickup</Text>
      </FreeText>
      <GrossWeight unitCode="KGM">2</GrossWeight>
      <LoadingMetres>0</LoadingMetres>
      <PalletFootPrints>0</PalletFootPrints>
      <HazardPoints>0</HazardPoints>
    </ShipmentHeaders>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="PickupEarliest">
      <DateTime>2019-01-31T11:33:09.9666092+01:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DeliveryEarliest">
      <DateTime>2019-01-31T15:33:09.9666092+01:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DeliveryLatest">
      <DateTime>2019-01-31T17:33:09.9666092+01:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <DateAndTimes subClass="DocumentDate">
      <DateTime>2019-01-31T07:33:09.9666092+01:00</DateTime>
    </DateAndTimes>
    <Sender partyId="00096882527">
      <Name>Sender name</Name>
      <Address>
        <AddressLine>MyStreet 123</AddressLine>
        <PostalCode>5122</PostalCode>
        <City>My City</City>
        <CountryCode>NO</CountryCode>
      </Address>
      <MobilePhone>12345678</MobilePhone>
      <Email>Sender@Sender.com</Email>
    </Sender>
    <Receiver>
      <Name>Receiver name</Name>
      <Address>
        <AddressLine>MyStreet 123</AddressLine>
        <PostalCode>5122</PostalCode>
        <City>Other City</City>
        <CountryCode>NO</CountryCode>
      </Address>
      <MobilePhone>87654321</MobilePhone>
      <Email>Receiver@Receiver.com</Email>
    </Receiver>
    <AdditionalParty subClass="TransportCompany" partyId="BEX" subPartyId="ALY" />
    <ProductAndService>
      <ProductCode>COURIER_1H</ProductCode>
      <AdditionalService>
        <AdditionalServiceCode>EVARSLING</AdditionalServiceCode>
      </AdditionalService>
    </ProductAndService>
    <GoodsItem>
      <GoodsDescription>Socks</GoodsDescription>
      <Package packageId="373500123456789012">
        <GrossWeight unitCode="KGM">1</GrossWeight>
      </Package>
      <Package packageId="37350012345678929">
        <GrossWeight unitCode="KGM">1</GrossWeight>
      </Package>
    </GoodsItem>
  </Shipment>
</CreateBookingRequest>
